title: Black Cleaver
body: Black Cleaver needs a visual update...i mean just look at it!!{{item:3071}} It's ugly!!!!

replies.body:
it did get one... like last year.

https://i.ytimg.com/vi/NxHWrY8np14/maxresdefault.jpg
I know it did, but it's still ugly....

I prefer the old one over the new one.


Riot is probably trying to implement that black lives matter that's why they changed it from white to black jk jk 

#NoRacismHere
